name: ddd-forum
description: Learn how to build a hacker news-type app with TypeScript & DDD

scripts.build:public: cd public/app && npm install && npm run build
scripts.db:flush:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run db:delete:dev && npm run db:create:dev
scripts.db:flush:test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test npm run db:delete:test && npm run db:create:test
scripts.migrate:dev: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=development dotenv -e .env sequelize db:migrate
scripts.migrate:test: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=test dotenv -e .env sequelize db:migrate --env test
scripts.setup:dev: npm install && npm run db:create:dev && npm run migrate:dev
scripts.test:sequence: jest us010-ssd.api.test.ts && jest US014-unpopular.api.test.ts && jest login.api.test.ts  && jest US011-ssd.api.test && jest logout.api.test.ts && jest US012-ssd.api.test.ts && jest delete.api.test.ts && jest US013-ssd.api.test.ts  && jest US015-ssd.api.test.ts && jest US016.api.test.ts && jest US017.api.test.ts && jest US018.api.test.ts && jest US019.api.test.ts && jest US020.api.test.ts && jest US009-ssd.api.test.ts  && jest src/api_test/US004 && jest src/api_test/US002 && jest src/api_test/US001 && jest src/api_test/US008 && jest src/api_test/US007  && jest src/api_test/US003 && jest src/api_test/US006 && jest src/api_test/US005 --coverage --coverageReporters="text" --coverageReporters="html" --coverageReporters="json"
scripts.test:sequence2: jest --runTestsByPath  __tests__/src/api_test/US010 src/api_test/US014 src/api_test/US011  src/api_test/US012  src/api_test/US013  src/api_test/US015 src/api_test/US016 src/api_test/US017 src/api_test/US018 src/api_test/US019 src/api_test/US020 src/api_test/US009 src/api_test/US004 src/api_test/US002 src/api_test/US001 src/api_test/US008 src/api_test/US007  src/api_test/US003 src/api_test/US006 src/api_test/US005 --coverage --coverageReporters="text" --coverageReporters="html" --coverageReporters="json"
scripts.run-all: npm run run-deleteDb && npm run test -- --runInBand --testPathPattern=api --config jest.config.js && npm run run-deleteDb
scripts.run-deleteDb: npm run db:delete:dev && npm run db:create:dev && npm run migrate:dev
scripts.run-debug: npm run build && npm run start:public

hooks.pre-commit: npm run build && newman run https://api.postman.com/collections/27864449-af25a6e9-a5c0-4f4f-a5fc-e67f1b176d50?access_key=PMAT-01HH0CAX2YAPCXERGFFKGCYRDH && npm run lint

author: Khalil Stemmler <khalil@khalilstemmler.com>
